QuickOptions.Name: Toggle Debug Camera
QuickOptions.Description: Toggles the visibility of the Debug Camera Coordinates.

QuickOptions.Name: Redraw Shaders
QuickOptions.Description: Redraws the cache's shaders, without reloading the map.

QuickOptions.Name: Create Checkpoint
QuickOptions.Description: Creates a gamestate checkpoint in the engine.

QuickOptions.Name: Load Checkpoint
QuickOptions.Description: Loads the most recent gamestate checkpoint (if no checkpoint has been set in a multiplayer match, it will reload the scenario).

QuickOptions.Name: End Game
QuickOptions.Description: Ends the current game, careful guys.

MemoryValues.Name: Toggle Debug Camera
MemoryValues.Description: Toggles the visibility of the Debug Camera Coordinates. (0x01 = on, 0x00 = off)

MemoryValues.Name: Redraw Shaders
MemoryValues.Description: Redraws the cache's shaders, without reloading the map.

MemoryValues.Name: Create Checkpoint
MemoryValues.Description: Creates a gamestate checkpoint in the engine.

MemoryValues.Name: Load Checkpoint
MemoryValues.Description: Loads the most recent gamestate checkpoint (if no checkpoint has been set in a multiplayer match, it will reload the scenario).

MemoryValues.Name: End Game
MemoryValues.Description: Ends the current game, careful guys.

MemoryValues.Name: Gravity
MemoryValues.Description: Sets the global gravity. Takes effect on map reload.

MemoryValues.Name: Third Person
MemoryValues.Description: Globally sets the player's perspective to third person.
